name: Childs play - kids educational game
description:
Kids educational game for any age that wants to practise on colours, shapes, words, spelling, sounds and plenty of other great things to learn.
It´s a basic app with no hard settings but still great potential and i made this app for my own kids at first and i was amazed how well it works!

Get it for free and let your child play around with the childs play educational app.
No in app purchases

Please rate it if you enjoy this free tool for your kids!
